<MemberDefinition

compress - Compress equivalence classes by numbering them 0 .

. M. This makes the equivalence class map immutable.

### findLeader() {#a1a57c4899aec61909b2b109a1ad32ae7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned IntEqClasses::findLeader (unsigned a) const">
findLeader - Compute the leader of a&#39;s equivalence class.

This is the smallest member of the class. This requires an uncompressed map.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/inteqclasses-h/#l00064">64</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/inteqclasses-h">IntEqClasses.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/inteqclasses-cpp/#l00053">53</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/inteqclasses-cpp">IntEqClasses.cpp</a>.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void IntEqClasses::grow (unsigned N)">
grow - Increase capacity to hold 0 .

. N-1, putting new integers in unique equivalence classes. This requires an uncompressed map.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/inteqclasses-h/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/inteqclasses-h">IntEqClasses.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/inteqclasses-cpp/#l00025">25</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/inteqclasses-cpp">IntEqClasses.cpp</a>.

### join() {#aa8502985b2f18ef8fb6edc0cecfb5f95}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned IntEqClasses::join (unsigned a, unsigned b)">
Join the equivalence classes of a and b.

After joining classes, findLeader(a) == findLeader(b). This requires an uncompressed map. Returns the new leader.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/inteqclasses-h/#l00059">59</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/inteqclasses-h">IntEqClasses.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/inteqclasses-cpp/#l00032">32</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/inteqclasses-cpp">IntEqClasses.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

## Private Member Attributes

### EC {#a7fa00a2480a46b3f9a1d81b1863e8e52}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>SmallVector&lt;unsigned, 8&gt; llvm::IntEqClasses::EC</>}>
EC - When uncompressed, map each integer to a smaller member of its equivalence class.

The class leader is the smallest member and maps to itself.

When compressed, EC&#91;i&#93; is the equivalence class of i.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/inteqclasses-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/inteqclasses-h">IntEqClasses.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::IntEqClasses::NumClasses = 0">
NumClasses - The number of equivalence classes when compressed, or 0 when uncompressed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/inteqclasses-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/inteqclasses-h">IntEqClasses.h</a>.
